nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,45 @@
+= Expressions available out of the box
+
+== Description
+
+Here one could find description of the expressions that are delivered with Vividus itself without any plugins required.
+
+=== Groovy
+
+==== *_Info_*
+
+Executes groovy script and converts result to a string.
+
+==== *_Wording_*
+
+[source,gherkin]
+----
+#{groovy(script)}

nodes.bodyText: is GroovyScriptEvaluator thread-safe? (in other words: is it safe to use it for multiple evaluations and from different threads?)
